item.title: FREE Parenting with Love and Logic
item.dc:creator: Nicole Balak
item.description: Limited time! Thanks to SARS-2/COVID-19, children are more stressed than ever, so the Love and Logic Institute is giving away their online course entitled “Parenting with Love and Logic”. One simply has to click over to Love and Logic: Parenting, Online and “buy” this free product. Then create an account and you’ll have access to […]
item.content:encoded:
Limited time!

Thanks to SARS-2/COVID-19, children are more stressed than ever, so the Love and Logic Institute is giving away their online course entitled “Parenting with Love and Logic”.

One simply has to click over to Love and Logic: Parenting, Online and “buy” this free product. Then create an account and you’ll have access to all of the information and resources.

NC PAN members Jennifer L and Nicole B both think that Love and Logic works really well for older late-tween-to-teen aged children. So if you have suddenly found yourself working with such charges due to school being out, take advantage of this great, free, course.

Hat tip Nicole the Doula.
